name: validatorjs-functions
title: Validator.js Functions
description: Search and copy and preview validator.js functions from the official repository.
author: daniel_jankowski

commands.name: function-search
commands.title: Function Search
commands.subtitle: validator.js
commands.description: Searches functions from the Validator.js library for copying into your project.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
